name: en_text's Shotgun
description: A shotgun for BadCatgirl to hold.

name: Dragostrophe's Shotgun
description: A shotgun for BlackFurDragon to hold.

name: Lifmunk's Submachine Gun
description:
Submachine gun made especially for Carbunclo.
Activate its Partner Skill, and Lifmunk
will ride on your head and fire at enemies.

name: Tocotoco's Gloves
description:
Gloves for gently holding ColorfulBird.
Activate its Partner Skill to hold ColorfulBird
and use it to fire explosive eggs.

name: en_text's Power Converter
description: A tool for safely riding DarkMutant.

name: Daedream's Necklace
description:
Collar for DreamDemon.
If DreamDemon is in your team, it will stay by your side and attack enemies in tandem.

name: Digtoise's Headband
description:
Headband for DrillGame.
Activate its Partner Skill to make DrillGame spin at high speeds, allowing it to more efficiently smash through rock.

name: Galeclaw's Gloves
description:
Gloves for gently holding on to Eagle's legs.
If Eagle is in your team,
it can be used as a glider.

name: Boltmane Saddle
description: A tool for safely riding ElecLion.

name: Grizzbolt's Minigun
description:
Makes ElecPanda fire a minigun
when ridden.

name: en_text Saddle
description: A tool for safely riding FeatherOstrich.

name: Flopie's Necklace
description:
Collar for FlowerRabbit.
If FlowerRabbit is in your team, it will stay by your side and automatically gather nearby items.

name: Celaray's Gloves
description:
Gloves for gently holding on to FlyingManta's fins.
If FlyingManta is in your team,
it can be used as a glider.

name: en_text Saddle
description: A tool for safely riding GoldenHorse.

name: Mossanda's Grenade Launcher
description:
Makes GrassPanda fire a grenade launcher
when ridden.

name: Mossanda Lux's Grenade Launcher
description:
Makes GrassPanda_Electric fire a grenade launcher
when ridden.

name: en_text Saddle
description: A tool for safely riding GuardianDog.

name: Jolthog's Gloves
description:
Rubber gloves for handling Hedgehog.
Activate its Partner Skill, and Hedgehog
will throw electric grenades.

name: Jolthog Cryst's Gloves
description:
Rubber gloves for handling Hedgehog_Ice.
Activate its Partner Skill, and Hedgehog_Ice
will throw ice grenades.

name: Jetragon's Missile Launcher
description:
Makes JetDragon fire missiles
when ridden.

name: Foxparks's Harness
description:
Harness for holding Kitsunebi.
Activate its Partner Skill to hold Kitsunebi
and attack using it as a flamethrower.

name: Relaxaurus's Missile Launcher
description:
Makes LazyDragon fire a missile launcher
when ridden.

name: Relaxaurus Lux's Missile Launcher
description:
Makes LazyDragon_Electric fire a missile launcher
when ridden.

name: Tanzee's Assault Rifle
description:
Assault rifle made especially for Monkey.
Activate its Partner Skill, and Monkey will enter gunner mode
and begin shooting at nearby enemies.

name: Killamari's Gloves
description:
Gloves for gently holding on to NegativeOctopus's legs.
If NegativeOctopus is in your team,
it can be used as a glider.

name: Pengullet's Rocket Launcher
description:
Rocket launcher for launching Penguin.
Activate its Partner Skill to fire Pengullet
and damage enemies. After firing, Penguin will become incapacitated.

name: Dazzi's Necklace
description:
Collar for RaijinDaughter.
If RaijinDaughter is in your team,
it will stay by your side and attack enemies in tandem.

name: Hangyu's Gloves
description:
Gloves for gently holding on to WindChimes's arms.
If WindChimes is in your team, it can be used as a glider.

name: Hangyu Cryst's Glove
description:
Gloves for gently holding on to WindChimes_Ice's arms.
If WindChimes_Ice is in your team, it can be used as a glider.

name: en_text Saddle
description: A tool for safely riding WingGolem.

name: Stone Spear
description:
Useful for close-range combat.
Its length allows you to stand further away when attacking.

name: Metal Spear
description:
Useful for close-range combat.
The metal tip give it an increased attack power.
Its length allows you to stand further away when attacking.

name: Refined Metal Spear
description:
Useful for close-range combat.
The high-quality metal tip give it an increased attack power.
Its length allows you to stand further away when attacking.

name: Lily's Spear
description:
The spear cherished by Lily.
Punishes those who neglect their Pals.

name: Elizabee's Staff
description:
Spear made from QueenBee's staff, altered for human use.
It is imbued with QueenBee's indomitable spirit.

name: Beegarde's Spear
description:
A spear made from the SoldierBee's spear, altered for human use.
Can feel a sincere loyalty.

name: Scatter Sphere Launcher
description:
A new type of launcher that fires a large number of spheres.
It can easily capture a herd of Pals.

name: Single-shot Sphere Launcher
description:
A launcher that fires spheres.
It can capture Pals that are a distance away.

name: Memory Wiping Medicine
description:
A potion that allows the player to reset status points when consumed.
It has no effect if consumed by Pal.

name: Pal Metal Armor
description:
Armor made from StealIngot.
High defense, but extremely heavy.
Equipment for a hero, it exudes bravery.

name: Cold Resistant Pal Metal Armor
description:
Improved StealArmor.
Useful for activities in cold regions.

name: Cold Resistant Pal Metal Armor
description:
Improved StealArmor.
Useful for activities in cold regions.

name: Cold Resistant Pal Metal Armor
description:
Improved StealArmor.
Useful for activities in cold regions.
